articles.title: Greetings to Kuwaiti Emir
articles.content:
Greetings to Kuwaiti Emir
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, emir of Kuwait, on the occasions of the 55th anniversary of its independence and the 25th anniversary of its liberation.
					 The message wished the emir good health and happiness and the friendly Kuwaiti people steady progress and prosperity.
					
					 It expressed the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Kuwait would grow strong in the future, too.

articles.title: Greetings to Kuwaiti PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Kuwaiti PM
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greeting to Jaber Al Mubarak Al Hamad Al Sabah, prime minister of Kuwait, on Feb. 25 on the occasions of the 55th anniversary of its independence and the 25th anniversary of its liberation.
					 The message expressed belief that the ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the prime minister bigger success in his responsible work for the country's progress, prosperity and development.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Sabah Al Khalid Al Hamad Al Sabah, first deputy prime minister and foreign minister of Kuwait.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Cote d'Ivoire
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Cote d'Ivoire
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Abdallah Albert Toikeusse Mabri upon his appointment as foreign minister of Cote d'Ivoire.
					 The message wished the foreign minister of Cote d'Ivoire success in his new job, expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields.

articles.title: Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo hosted a reception at his embassy on Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other officials concerned.
					
					 Referring to the validity of Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, the ambassador said:
					
					 His exploits for progressive mankind as well as the Korean people will go down forever.
					
					 He made tremendous contributions to developing friendship between the two countries. The friendly relations between the two parties, armies and peoples would grow stronger.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said the Cuban people significantly celebrated the Day of the Shining Star with the Korean people, a manifestation of their deep reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il would always live in the hearts of not only the Korean people but the world progressives, praising his life as the one of a revolutionary who took the untrodden path with firm will and superhuman energy.
					
					 He said that the Korean people would make every effort to further develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the Cuban people true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Syrian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Syrian Ambassador Gives Reception
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Syrian Ambassador to the DPRK Tammam Sulaiman gave a reception at his embassy Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Syria Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador said that Kim Jong Il, who successfully carried forward the intention of President Kim Il Sung, turned the DPRK into an impregnable fortress that no enemy dare encroach upon and defended the people's happiness with his outstanding Songun politics.
					
					 The Korean people have firmly defended the dignity and the sovereignty of the country despite the U.S. and its followers' moves to isolate and stifle the country thanks to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, he noted.
					
					 He hoped that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger this year, the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Syria and the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam said that Kim Jong Il performed in smashing the hostile forces' moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, firmly defended socialism and made immortal contribution to preserving peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world by pursuing the original Songun politics.
					
					 He noted that the friendly and cooperative relations provided by the preceding leaders of the two countries are growing stronger under the deep concern of Marshal Kim Jong Un and President Bashar Al-Assad. 
					
					 He noted that the Korean people will extend invariable support and solidarity to the Syrian government and people in their just struggle to defend the country's sovereignty and territory integrity in the future, too.

articles.title: Jilin Provincial Symphony Orchestra of China Departs for Home
articles.content:
Jilin Provincial Symphony Orchestra of China Departs for Home
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Jilin Provincial Symphony Orchestra of China led by Su Wei, deputy director-general of the Culture Department of Jilin Province, left here for home on Thursday.

articles.title: Overseas Compatriots Leave
articles.content:
Overseas Compatriots Leave
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Canada left here on Thursday.
					 Earlier leaving here was the secretary-general of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction of Stockbreeding Base in Sepho Area
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction of Stockbreeding Base in Sepho Area
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the construction site of the stockbreeding base in Sepho area.
					 Going round various places of the site, he encouraged the builders who are registering successes in carrying out projects and improving the land in order to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with shining labor successes.
					
					 A consultative meeting was held on the spot. It discussed measures for supplying materials to successfully push forward the projects and matters arising in cultivating grass of good species such as "Aegukpul" and remarkably increasing the livestock products by putting livestock breeding on a scientific and technical basis.
					
					 Earlier, he inspected the site for remodeling the Kim Il Sung Stadium and the Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City.
					
					 He called for qualitatively renovating the stadium and supplying a sufficient amount of materials necessary for the project. He also underscored the need for the agricultural workers of the farm to direct efforts to making preparations for this year's farming and increase per-hectare grain yield by widely introducing scientific farming methods.

articles.title: Wonsan Air Festival-2016 to Be Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Wonsan Air Festival-2016 to Be Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- An international friendship air festival, called Wonsan Air Festival-2016, will be held in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on September 24-26.
					 According to Ri Sing Ryol, vice-chairman of the Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang ITZ Development Committee, the festival is to take place in the city of Wonsan which is renewing its looks as a world-level tourist city.
					
					 An emblem for the festival was published.
					
					 During the festival, there will be various events at Kalma Airport, Songdowon and other parts of the scenic city.
					
					 The festival is to consist of aviation demonstration by warplanes, air trip by light and other planes of the Air Koryo, flying balloons, parachuting and demonstration by members of the Pyongyang Air Club.
					
					 Art performance, Taekwon-Do demonstration, peasant dance, sports and amusement games, dancing party of youth and students and firework display will add to the festival mood.
					
					 A large number of air sports fans and tourists in various countries of Asia and Europe have expressed their willingness to take part in the festival.
					
					 Ri Sing Ryol told that tour of Mts. Paektu and Myohyang and other scenic spots of the country is expected with the festival as an occasion.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Meet
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Meet
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Pyongyangites met at Kim Il Sung Square on Thursday to vow to thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth in the joint calls made by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and become honorable victors in the 70-day campaign of loyalty.
					 Present at the rally were Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and leading officials of the party and state, officials of the working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of the party and administrative and working people's organizations, institutions, universities, factories, enterprises and farms, heroes, persons of merits and working people in the city.
					
					 Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, made a report.
					
					 He said that the 70-day campaign of loyalty is a whole-party, whole-state and all-people general mobilization campaign and all-out death-defying campaign to greet the Seventh Congress of the WPK as the one of victors and glory to usher in a golden age in building a thriving nation, and also an all-out offensive campaign for hastening the final victory of revolution.
					
					 He referred to the fact that in the past the officials, party members and other working people in Pyongyang made great leap forward by dashing forward in the van of the country, holding high the banner of implementing the party policies.
					
					 He called upon all people to wage a dynamic struggle with redoubled courage to create world-startling miracles and innovations in the 70-day campaign of loyalty and glorify the Seventh Congress of the WPK as the one of victors and glory, united close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then representatives of the working class, agricultural workers, youth and officials made speeches.
					
					 They expressed their determination to turn out as one in the 70-day campaign and register biggest successes and most brilliant labor merits.
					
					 At the end of the rally there took place a demonstration.

articles.title: Workers and Members of GFTUK Hold Seminar
articles.content:
Workers and Members of GFTUK Hold Seminar
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar of the workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday to deeply grasp and thoroughly embody the idea on the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il workers Marshal Kim Jong Un gave fresh clarification to.
					 Presented at the seminar were the papers demonstrating the originality and validity of the idea and theory of the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il workers and dealing with the tasks for discharging the mission and duty as a core unit of the Juche revolution and the eldest son of the country and ways of doing so.
					
					 The speakers said Kim Jong Un gave fresh clarification to the character, position and ideological and moral qualities of the Korean workers for the first time in history as required by the Korean revolution and the developing times.
					
					 They expounded their views that the Korean workers have absolute loyalty to the party and leader, transparent revolutionary consciousness and spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 They mentioned that the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il workers are a core unit of the Juche revolution and the eldest son of the country that are obliged to support the Party's ideas and cause in the vanguard and advance holding up the torch of a new great revolutionary upsurge in building an economic giant.
					
					 They stressed that it was the revolutionary duty and moral obligation of all the workers and members of the GFTUK to repay with loyalty the deepest trust with which Kim Jong Un called them the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il workers.

articles.title: First Fishing Campaign Begins in West Sea of Korea
articles.content:
First Fishing Campaign Begins in West Sea of Korea
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- First fishing campaign began at fishery stations in the west coastal area of the DPRK as part of the 70-day campaign to greet the historic Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented labor achievements.
					 A ceremony took place at the Nampho Fishery Station to give a good send-off to fishermen on Feb. 25.
					
					 At fishery stations including the Kamapho Fishery Station under the North and South Phyongan provincial fishery management bureaus, scores of fishing boats left their anchorages for fishing grounds.

articles.title: Albumin Fusion Proteins Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Albumin Fusion Proteins Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Institute of Genetic Medicine under Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK has recently developed albutropin and albuthyrin, albumin fusion proteins, through introduction of the albumin fusion technology. 
					 The albumin fusion technology helps manufacture novel next-generation protein drugs by fusing the gene that expresses human serum albumin (HAS) to the gene that expresses a therapeutically active protein or peptide.
					
					 Administration of those drugs once 5 days or once weekly to patients has longer duration of action than daily non-fused therapeutic protein treatment.
					
					 Albutropin injection is efficacious for such diseases as pituitary dwarfism, growth hormone deficiency and Turner's syndrome and albuthyrin injection has a special virtue for malacosteon and osteoporosis.
					
					 Ri Myong Hak, section chief of the Institute, told KCNA that the institute acquired with its own efforts the albumin fusion technology, an exclusive property of a few countries. Those albumin fusion proteins, developed with the technology, may provide patients with long-acting treatment options that may offer more convenient dosing regime, he added.

articles.title: U.S. Confrontation Hysteria Infuriates DPRK People
articles.content:
U.S. Confrontation Hysteria Infuriates DPRK People
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Frantic moves of the U.S. imperialist war hawks are now arousing the great wrath and hatred from among all the servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK.
					 Noting that the situation of the Korean peninsula has reached a dangerous phase that can not be overlooked any longer, due to the U.S. imperialists' provocative moves, Kim Hyong Chol, curator of the National House of Class Education, told KCNA: 
					
					 They are running amuck to ignite another Korean war, but such attempt makes the Korean people recall the aggressors' history of defeats.
					
					 The Korean War in the 1950s was, in fact, a battle between rifle and A-bomb, but the army and people of the DPRK inflicted a political and military defeat on the U.S. imperialist aggressors for the first time in history, demonstrating the stamina of heroic Korea.
					
					 In 1960s when its armed spy ship Pueblo was captured by the Korean People's Army, the U.S. drove the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war, dispatching its aircraft carrier and task forces into the East Sea of Korea. However, it could not but make a written apology to the courageous DPRK.
					
					 After that, the U.S. imperialists suffered defeats in such cases as spy plane EC-121 and "Panmunjom" incidents.
					
					 Early in 1990s, the U.S. sought outbreak of an all-out nuclear war against the DPRK, spreading a story about "early collapse of North Korea".
					
					 But, eventually, it had to sign the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework and offer its president's letter of guarantee to the DPRK.
					
					 The servicepersons and civilians in the DPRK, rallied closely around the supreme leadership of the revolution, will mete out merciless punishment to the U.S. imperialists making desperate efforts in a nuclear nightmare so that they can write a history of their final defeat for themselves.
					
					 Ryang Jae Nam, an officer of the Moranbong District, Pyongyang, Worker-Peasant Red Guards, said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are deploying their huge aggression armed forces in south Korea, including their special operation troops, nuclear-powered submarine and Stealth fighter-bombers to kick off the Key Resolve, Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises.
					
					 Anyhow, such action can never frighten the army and people in the DPRK.
					
					 It is the fixed will of the army and people of the DPRK to inflict the final defeat on the U.S. imperialists if they continue to show confrontation hysteria, oblivious of the lessons of history they drew in the past showdown with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists should behave themselves, well aware of the do-or-die spirit of the Korean army and people who have always emerged victorious.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued four stamps (individual) calling for working miracles in building a thriving nation.
					 They carry posters with such slogans as "Don't abandon revolutionary faith though one may die!", "Let's develop all sectors by dint of science and technology!", "Let's make a big haul in the fighting spirit displayed by the People's Army in making a new history of big fish haul!" and "Let's fly higher the flag of the DPRK in international games!".
					
					 Meanwhile, the Bureau published an individual stamp calling on all the people to turn out in the forest restoration campaign and the one showing full-service ship Mujigae which was opened in October last year.

articles.title: Cancellation of Projected U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises Demanded by Organizations of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Cancellation of Projected U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises Demanded by Organizations of Koreans in Japan
Tokyo, February 24 (KNS-KCNA) -- Members of the Confederation of South Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Reunification, the south Korean Youth League in Japan, the south Korean Democratic Women's Society and the south Korean Students Consultative Council in Japan staged a protest action in front of the U.S. embassy in Tokyo on February 22 urging cancellation of the plan for the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises and the conclusion of a peace treaty.
					 It was joined by members of the National Network of the Japan-South Korea People's Solidarity.
					
					 Representatives of the Confederation of South Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Reunification and the National Network of the Japan-South Korea People's Solidarity separately thrust their written requests to the U.S. embassy.
					
					 The Confederation of South Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Reunification said in the written request that the above-said joint military exercises are fraught with the danger of a nuclear war, adding that dialogue between the DPRK and the U.S. is the only way of settling the present situation and opting for improved relations.
					
					 The National Network of the Japan-South Korea People's Solidarity said in its written request that it is opposed to the U.S.-south Korea military alliance for peace in East Asia and demands the conclusion of the DPRK-U.S. peace treaty.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates an article to the second anniversary of the publication of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive".
					 This work is the speech made by him at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea on February 25, Juche 103 (2014). It comprehensively deals with the issue of focusing the ideological work on firmly establishing the Party's unitary leadership system, the issue of raising a hot wind of ideological work to give strong impetus to defending socialism and other theoretical and practical issues in intensifying the Party's ideological work at present. 
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Un's work serves as a militant banner which brought about a new turn in the drive to establish the Party's unitary leadership system, the article goes on:
					
					 For the past two years all the officials, Party members and other working people have prepared themselves as genuine Kimilsungists and Kimjongilists through a strong habit of study to acquire the works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and Party literature systemically and in chronological order and the revolutionary work style of solving all issues arising in the Party building and activities under the leadership of the Party was established.
					
					 All the service personnel and people of the DPRK formed a great harmonious whole which breathes the same breath and acts as one sharing the idea with the Party Central Committee and the behests of the great leaders and the Party policies are becoming brilliant realities amid the vigorous drive to carry out the Party ideas and defend Party policies. These are the biggest successes made in the course of the dynamic revolutionary ideological offensive.
					
					 Popular heroism is being fully displayed on all fronts for building a thriving nation and a lot of world-startling monumental edifices were built in the spirit of self-development-first principle. This goes to frully prove the powerful might of the Party's ideological work.

articles.title: Minju Joson Calls for Eliminating Park Geun Hye, Biggest Trouble Maker of Nation
articles.content:
Minju Joson Calls for Eliminating Park Geun Hye, Biggest Trouble Maker of Nation
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Thursday carries a commentary on the lapse of three years since the Park Geun Hye regime emerged in south Korea.
					 South Korean people from all walks of life are taking to streets, shouting "We can't live this way" and "Let us overthrow the regime" as they have suffered too much from the Park Geun Hye's rule for the past three years.  Those who voted for Park, deceived by her commitments, are regretting their irresponsible behaviors. Even the conservative quarters which she regards as her support base are becoming increasingly critical of Chongwadae. However, the Park' group is making desperate efforts to prolong its remaining days by using repressive machines, instead of stepping down.
					
					 This is sparking off the stronger protest among the south Korean people all out in the anti-"government" actions, spitting at Park, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Park has committed too many hideous crimes to enumerate for the past three years of her office.
					
					 Every sin brings its punishment with it and a trouble should be rooted out as early as possible.
					
					 Not far off is the day when Park would meet a miserable end in face of the fierce struggle of the south Korean people to force her regime to pay for its crimes.
					
					 No matter how desperate the Park regime may become in its moves to stay in office, it can never escape the people's severe punishment.
					
					 It is the strong demand of the nation that the Park regime be sternly punished for committing thrice-cursed crimes against the country and nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Service Personnel's and People's Steadfast Will to Settle Accounts with U.S. Imperialists
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Service Personnel's and People's Steadfast Will to Settle Accounts with U.S. Imperialists
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are openly blustering that they will examine the feasibility of the combined "beheading operation", a key program of OPLAN 5015, and the "removal operation" of nuclear and strategic rocket forces of the DPRK during the upcoming Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article terms this an extremely serious politically-motivated provocation and the height of hostile acts against the DPRK.
					
					 The crucial statement issued by the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army reflects the firm stand and will of all service personnel and people of the DPRK to mercilessly punish those who try to get the sun eclipsed, no matter who they are and where they are, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces will have to pay a very high price for its high treason to get the sun eclipsed and bring down the social system in the DPRK.
					
					 The same is true of the U.S. If the U.S. persists in its foolish military actions, failing to come to its senses despite the DPRK's warnings, the Korean-style striking operation which has been in the making for several decades for the final battle will be an unimaginable retaliation war and reduce bases for aggression in the Asia-Pacific region and the U.S. mainland to ashes.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates its mainland will be safe.
					
					 Steadfast is the faith of all service personnel and people to turn out as one in the confrontation with the U.S. imperialists and settle accounts with them.
					
					 The U.S. should choose between two options. One is to face the DPRK's merciless punishment and another is to make an apology for its wrongdoings, though belatedly, and bridge over the crisis.

articles.title: Nullification of Agreement on Issue of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Nullification of Agreement on Issue of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1 219th Wednesday meeting before a statue of a girl before the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Feb. 24 in demand of the proper settlement of the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The organization said at the meeting that a victim of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army passed away on Feb. 20 with her grudge unsettled, accusing the south Korean authorities of making a humiliating "agreement" with Japan, paying no heed to the demands of the victims.
					
					 It declared March 1 as the "day of national action" to nullify the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery.
					
					 It clarified that it would simultaneously hold meetings and launch demos on that day at the Chonggye Plaza and places where statues of a girl of peace are located.

articles.title: Halt to Suppression of Jongyojo Demanded by S. Korean Body
articles.content:
Halt to Suppression of Jongyojo Demanded by S. Korean Body
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress in south Korea issued a statement on Feb. 22 to demand the authorities stop the suppression of the Teachers Union (Jongyojo).
					 The statement accused the Ministry of Education of mulling urging 17 city and provincial education agencies to take four follow-up steps such as cancellation of temporary retirement of the full-time officials of Jongyojo and their return to schools, halt to support to trade union offices and stop to collective contract and implementing them.
					
					 Such action against Jongyojo was pursuant to the unreasonable decision made by the Seoul High Court on Jan. 21, it charged.
					
					 It demanded the authorities stop the unreasonable suppression of Jongyojo.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Reject Humiliating "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Reject Humiliating "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Students of high schools of south Korea launched a man demonstration before the building of the puppet Foreign Ministry on Feb. 13 in denunciation of the humiliating "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 They accused the south Korean and Japanese authorities of concluding the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army through closed door diplomacy, ignoring the people and victims.
					
					 They demanded Park Geun Hye make an apology to the victims of the sexual slavery for the wrong "agreement".
					
					 They urged the south Korean and Japanese authorities to immediately retract the unreasonable "agreement" and opt for properly settling the issue of the sexual slavery.
					
					 They declared that such actions including a man demo would continue till Japan owns legal responsibility and makes an official apology and reparation for the sexual slavery.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams Authorities
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams Authorities for Talking about "Emergency"
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on Feb. 24 denounced the puppet authorities for making desperate efforts to pass the "bill on preventing terrorism" which would bring "reign of terror" through the "National Assembly".
					 The speaker of the puppet "National Assembly" brought up for discussion the "bill on preventing terrorism" persistently asserted by Park Geun Hye at the full-dress session of the NA by abusing his power, the editorial noted, adding:
					
					 The NA speaker's action was at the request of Chongwadae.
					
					 The regime is pushed the present situation to "emergency" while pulling up the north. This reminds one of the dictatorship regime which declared the "emergency" and posed a threat to the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Posted by Chilean Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Posted by Chilean Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was posted by the Chilean Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on its website on the occasion of his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Works of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Published in Russia
articles.content:
Works of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Published in Russia
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" and Marshal Kim Jong Un's works "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive" and "Let Us Usher in a New Heyday of Building a Sports Power in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu" were separately published in booklet by the Knizhnii Mir Publishing House of Russia.
					 The work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution", published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun-based revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode in the present era that has carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line on attaching importance to the army, and a scientific and revolutionary line and political mode most correctly meeting the requirements of the times and the revolution.
					
					 The work "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive", published on Feb. 25, 2014, clarifies that the whole course of the Korean revolution can be called a period of ideological work to give fullest play to the might of the truth of the revolutionary ideas of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The work "Let Us Usher in a New Heyday of Building a Sports Power in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu", published on March 25, 2015, says that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il indicated the way for the Juche-oriented sports to follow with their outstanding ideas and leadership and opened up a new history of building a sports power.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways for building a sports power.
					
					 A ceremony of releasing the works took place at the publishing house on February 14.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Nepal, India
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Nepal, India
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- There took place seminars, book and photo exhibitions in Nepal and India on Feb. 8 and 9 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were books introducing their exploits and pictures showing the achievements made by the DPRK.
					
					 The minister of Irrigation of Nepal praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding statesman and distinguished leader, adding that the DPRK instills strength, courage and confidence into the people of many countries fighting for independence against imperialism.
					
					 The secretary general of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee of Nepal noted Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership exploits would last forever.
					
					 Vipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, and other speakers said it was the greatest exploit of Kim Jong Il that he defended Korean socialism with his original Songun politics.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Nepal.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in DR Congo
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in DR Congo
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The DR Congo preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) sponsored a meeting of a political party and public organizations on Feb. 16.
					 Display on the front wall of the event was an art work depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 Displayed there were photos dealing with their revolutionary careers and exploits, and the revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were photos of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 roaring into space, Mirae Scientists Street and other monumental buildings and books introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Communist Party of DR Congo, the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, the above-said preparatory committee, the Working Citizens' Association of DR Congo and the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association and masses.
					
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the above-said preparatory committee, praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding thinker and theoretician born as the Shining Star over Mt. Paektu in Korea and the great sun of Songun which defended socialism and indicated the way of building a thriving nation with his original Songun politics. 
					
					 The exploits he performed before the times and history will be remembered in the hearts of humankind, the chairman concluded.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo Exhibitions Held in Germany and Nigeria
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo Exhibitions Held in Germany and Nigeria
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK book and photo exhibitions took place by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany, the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria, the Kim Jong Il Library in Enugu State, Nigeria, the Franoson Mannyon International Co. Ltd., Nigeria and at a hospital of Nigeria between Feb. 1 and 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the venues of the exhibitions were photos dealing with his revolutionary career and feats.
					
					 Displayed there were also works of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books and photos introducing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that Kim Jong Il had firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and the socialist cause of the world under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 The department vice director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria noted that Kim Jong Il was the great leader who firmly believed in the strength of the people and inspired the people ideologically in order to solve all problems arising in the revolution and construction.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Supported by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Supported by Brazilian Organization
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on Feb. 13 posted on a website a special write-up illustrated with video clips showing Marshal Kim Jong Un watching a carrier rocket and satellite as regards the DPRK's successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The website in an article said that the DPRK succeeded in launching another satellite on Feb. 7, Juche 105 (2016). It went on:
					
					 The successful launch of the satellite named Kwangmyongsong-4 is the brilliant result of the wise leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is also a proud fruition of the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea of attaching importance to science and technology.
					
					 To develop space for peaceful purposes is the DPRK's independent right which no one can replace.
					
					 The successful satellite launch goes to prove that the DPRK can launch a manned satellite in the near future.
					
					 The recent satellite launch proves once again that Korean socialism is invincible.
					
					 Posted on the website were the video clips showing the launch of Kwangmyongsong-4, army-people rally for celebrating the successful satellite launch held at Kim Il Sung Square and display of fireworks.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Accuses Abe Regime of Pushing DPRK-Japan Relations to Stalemate
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Accuses Abe Regime of Pushing DPRK-Japan Relations to Stalemate
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on a website an article titled "Abe regime should account for pushing DPRK-Japan relations to catastrophe" on Feb. 13.
					 The article accused the Japanese authorities of deciding to take sanctions measures against the DPRK independent of the UN sanctions under the pretext of the latter's H-bomb test and satellite launch and of getting more frantic in a racket such as re-effectuation of those sanctions which it partially lifted before.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The perfidious act of Japan such as scrapping even the agreement reached at the inter-governmental talks without hesitation, being bereft of elementary fidelity, only invited extreme aversion.
					
					 Enumerating the DPRK's just stand on Japan which is revealing its sinister intention to push the DPRK-Japan relations to a stalemate and stand up against it to the end, the article stressed that the Abe regime should have to be fully responsible for driving the bilateral relations to a catastrophe.

articles.title: Japan's Hostile Acts against DPRK Denounced by British Organizations
articles.content:
Japan's Hostile Acts against DPRK Denounced by British Organizations
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on Feb. 18 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' provocative hostile acts against the DPRK.
					 The statement accused the Japanese reactionaries of recently kicking up a provocative sanctions racket under the pretext of the successful H-bomb test and satellite launch of the DPRK.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The DPRK's H-bomb test and satellite launch can not be found fault with by Japan as they represent the exercise of a sovereign state's legitimate and independent right and justifiable measures.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' real intention is to stifle the socialist system of the DPRK which is leaping forward and advancing on a daily basis under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 Their any sanctions can not block the DPRK's advance guided by the Juche idea and self-supporting national economy.
					
					 The progressive forces of Britain fully support the just stand of the DPRK which decided to totally stop the comprehensive investigation into all the Japanese that was under way under the inter-governmental Stockholm agreement and dissolve the "Special Investigation Committee" as Japan revealed its black-hearted intention to push the DPRK-Japan relations to a catastrophe and stand up against the DPRK to the end.

articles.title: Japan's Hostile Acts against DPRK Accused by Slovenian and Beninese Organizations
articles.content:
Japan's Hostile Acts against DPRK Accused by Slovenian and Beninese Organizations
Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Slovenian and Beninese organizations strongly accused the Japanese authorities of their provocative hostile acts against the DPRK.
					 The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association stated on Feb. 18:
					
					 On Feb. 7 the DPRK succeeded in putting the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 on its orbit. This is a proud success which demonstrated once again the might of its space science and technology before the world.
					
					 The satellite launch can not be put into question as it is a right of a sovereign state.
					
					 However, Japan engrossed in confrontation with the DPRK is raising a hue and cry.
					
					 The Japanese government would be well advised to lift its sanctions against the DPRK, awake from its anachronistic daydream.
					
					 On the same day the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued the following joint statement:
					
					 We strongly denounce the Japanese authorities for taking before any other countries sanctions measures against Juche Korea, independent of the UN sanctions under the pretext of its H-bomb test and satellite launch.
					
					 Sanctions against the DPRK are a violation of international law.
					
					 If Japan persistently resorts to the hostile policy toward the DPRK, following the lead of the U.S., it can never escape the world progressive peoples' strong denunciation and rejection.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a emir de Estado de Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a emir de Estado de Kuwait
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 25 un mensaje de felicitacion al emir del Estado de Kuwait, Sheikh Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, con motivo del 55o aniversario de la independencia de Kuwait y del 25o de liberacion del mismo pais. 
					El remitente desea al destinatario buena salud y felicidad, y a su pueblo amistoso, incesante progreso y prosperidad. 
					
					Y expresa la conviccion de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre Corea y Kuwait seguiran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose tambien en el futuro.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete para 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete para 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, embajador de la Republica de Cuba en Corea ofrecio el dia 25 en su sede diplomatica un banquete dedicado al dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					A la recepcion fueron invitados Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Kim Jong Suk, presidenta del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y otros funcionarios.
					
					El embajador cubano en su discurso se refirio a la justeza de la bandera de Songun, enarbolada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Dijo que seran inmortales las hazanas del Dirigente realizadas para el pueblo coreano y los otros progresistas del mundo.
					
					Senalo que el Dirigente hizo aporte al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises y agrego que se profundizaran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad entre los partidos, ejercito y pueblos de dos paises.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop dijo que el pueblo cubano celebra con significado con el pueblo coreano el Dia de la Estrella Luz, lo cual es una muestra de gran veneracion al Dirigente.
					
					La vida del Dirigente es la vida brillante del revolucionario quien con la ferrea voluntad y el empeno sobrehumano abrio un camino inexplorado y espinoso, dijo y continuo que el Dirigente estara vivo para siempre en el corazon del pueblo coreano y la humanidad progresista del mundo.
					
					Subrayo que en acato al noble proposito de los grandes Lideres y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano hara ingentes esfuerzos por desarrollar mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el pueblo cubano.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju dirige campo de construccion de base ganadera de zona de Sepho
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju dirige campo de construccion de base ganadera de zona de Sepho
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, dirigio en el terreno el campo de construccion de la base ganadera de la zona de Sepho. 
					Dando vueltas por varios puntos, estimulo a los constructores que estan registrando innovaciones en la construccion de objetos pedidos, la produccion de materiales para el mejoramiento de la tierra, etc. con la decision de acoger con exitos laborales el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno, se dio enfasis en la necesidad de tomar medidas para asegurar los materiales necesarios a la construccion de objetos pedidos y se discutieron los temas para aumentar la produccion ganadera mediante el cultivo de plantas forrajeras de buena variedad como la "hierba Aeguk" y la cria y cuidado cientifico-tecnicos de ganados.
					
					Con anterioridad, Pak recorrio el campo de obra de remodelacion del Estadio Kim Il Sung y la Granja Cooperativa de Chongsan del municipio de Kangso de la ciudad de Nampho.
					
					El premier se refirio a asegurar la calidad de la obra y suministrar suficientemente los materiales necesarios, hacer bien los preparativos agricolas en la Granja Cooperativa de Chongsan y elevar el rendimiento por hectarea mediante la aplicacion de los metodos cientificos de cultivo.

articles.title: Tiene lugar mitin multitudinaria de ciudad de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Tiene lugar mitin multitudinaria de ciudad de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este jueves en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin multitudinario de la ciudad de Pyongyang para materializar cabalmente las tareas presentadas en las consignas conjuntas del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y hacerse dignos triunfadores en la campana de 70 dias.
					Estuvieron presentes Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, funcionarios de entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, instituciones partidistas y administrativas, organismos, universidades, fabricas, empresas y granjas, asi como los heroes, ameritados y trabajadores en la capital. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del secretario jefe del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Kim Su Gil.
					
					El informante dijo que la campana de fidelidad de 70 dias es la ofensiva general y decisiva de todo el partido, todo el Estado y todo el pueblo para acoger el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como conclave de triunfadores y de gloria y adelantar la victoria final de la revolucion. 
					
					Menciono que los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores capitalinos han alcanzado saltos asombrosos marchando a galopes al frente de todo el pais en materializar las politicas del Partido. 
					
					Llamo a todos a unirse compactamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y marchar con vigor para crear milagros e innovaciones seculares en la campana de fidelidad de 70 dias y acoger el VII Congreso del PTC como conclave de triunfadores y de gloria. 
					
					Luego, intervinieron los representantes de clase obrera, trabajadores agricolas, jovenes y funcionarios. 
					
					Los oradores manifestaron las decisiones de lograr mayores exitos y meritos en la campana de 70 dias. 
					
					Terminado el mitin, tuvo lugar una manifestacion multitudinaria.

articles.title: Se efectuara Festival Internacional de Amistad de Aviacion de Wonsan 2016
articles.content:
Se efectuara Festival Internacional de Amistad de Aviacion de Wonsan 2016
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se preve el Festival Internacional de Amistad de Aviacion en la zona de Wonsan que renueva su fisonomia como ciudad turistica de talla mundial.
					El vicepresidente del comite de promocion de desarrollo de la zona del turismo internacional Wonsan-Monte Kumgang, Ri Sing Ryol dijo que se efectuara desde el 24 hasta el 26 de septiembre el Festival Internacional de Amistad de Aviacion  de Wonsan 2016.
					
					Se diseno la insignia del festival descrita con peculiaridad.
					
					En el periodo del festival tendran lugar los diversos actos en varios lugares de la zona de Wonsan como el Aeropuerto Kalma reconstruido magnificamente y la playa de Songdowon.
					
					Se planean la demostracion ejemplar del arte de aviacion de los aviones militares, el viaje a bordo del avion y el ligero de la Aerolinea Coryo, la voladura del globo aerostatico, el paracaidismo y la demostracion modelo de aeromodelistas del Club de Aviacion de Pyongyang,
					
					Adornaran mas el festival la funcion artistica, la demostracion modelo de Taekwondo, la danza agricola, las diversiones recreativas y deportivas, el baile de jovenes y estudiantes y el disparo de fuegos artificiales.
					
					Ahora muchos aficionados al deporte aereo y turistas de los paises asiaticos y europeos muestran la voluntad de participar en el festival con gran atencion.
					
					Ri previo que con motivo del festival se realizara el turismo a los montes Paektu y Myohyang y los demas lugares famosos de Corea.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta 3 anos de mandato de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta 3 anos de mandato de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- El periodico Minju Joson inserto en su edicion fechada 25 un comentario individual con respecto a que se cumplen 3 anos desde cuando apareciera en el suelo surcoreano el "poder" de Park Geun-hye.
					Diversos estratos surcoreanos, tan aborrecidos por la gobernacion de Park, se entregan a la lucha gritando las consignas "Ya no podemos aguantar mas" y "Derrumbemos al gobierno", senala el comentario y prosigue:
					
					Las personas quienes votaron a favor de Park estan arrepintiendose de sus actos irreflexivos. Se escuchan las quejas hasta en el interior de la capa conservadora que Park la considera como su base de apoyo.
					
					Sin embargo, los compinches de Park hacen esfuerzos desesperados para mantener su restante vida al movilizar todos los organos represivos en vez de retirarse de sus asientos.
					
					Tal proceder provoca mas la resistencia intransigente de la poblacion surcoreana levantada en la lucha antigubernamental.
					
					Son innumerables los crimenes del poder de Park cometidos durante 3 anos de su mandato.
					
					Hay un refran que dice: Cada cual responde por sus actos. 
					
					Es necesario eliminar cuanto antes el fautor de todas las desgracias.
					
					Park es causante de todas las maldades a ser eliminada cuanto antes.
					
					Pronto llegara el dia en que la horda de Park sea sentenciada duramente por los diversos estratos surcoreanos levantados como un solo hombre para sacar la cuenta final con los crimenes de los compinches titeres. 
					
					Por mas que se desespere para mantener su autoridad, la banda de Park no podra evitar jamas el duro castigo de la opinion publica.
					
					Es la voluntad de toda la nacion castigar severamente a los compinches de Park que solamente cometen los crimenes imperdonables ante el pais y la nacion.

articles.title: Ideologia de Juche es bandera de victoria de revolucion coreana, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ideologia de Juche es bandera de victoria de revolucion coreana, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto en su edicion fechada 25 un articulo individual dedicado al 2o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "Anticipemos la victoria definitiva con una ofensiva ideologica revolucionaria".
					El trabajo pronunciado el 25 de febrero del 103(2014) de la Era Juche en la VIII Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, sintetiza los temas teorico-practicos para mejorar y fortalecer en la actualidad la labor ideologica del partido, entre ellos, el de concentrar las fuerzas de la labor ideologica del partido en establecer firmemente el sistema de direccion unica del Partido y el de desarrollar la batalla ideologica para impulsar con dinamismo la lucha por la defensa del socialismo.
					
					La obra del Mariscal es la bandera combativa que trajo el nuevo viraje en la campana para establecer el sistema de direccion unica del partido, senala el articulo y prosigue:
					
					En medio del fervor de 2 anos ultimos para estudiar de manera historica y sistematica las obras de los grandes Lideres y del Mariscal, todos los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y los trabajadores se formaron como verdaderos kimilsungistas y kimjongilistas armados firmemente con la idea revolucionaria del Lider y la politica del partido y se establecio cabalmente el ambiente revolucionario de resolver bajo la direccion del partido todos los problemas presentados en la construccion y las actividades del partido.
					
					Todos los militares y civiles estan unidos monoliticamente compartiendo la idea, el aliento y el paso con el Comite Central del PTC y materializan el legado de los grandes Lideres y la politica del partido al desarrollar con dinamismo la campana para materializar la idea del partido y defender la politica del partido.
					
					Estos exitos orgullosos fueron logrados en el proceso de librar con vigor la ofensiva ideologica revolucionaria.
					
					En todas las ramas de la construccion de un Estado prospero se puso en pleno manifiesto el heroismo masivo y bajo la consigna del autofortalecimiento se construyeron numerosas creaciones monumentales asombrosas al mundo, lo cual comprueba patentemente el poderio inagotable de la labor ideologica del partido.

articles.title: Es inmutable conviccion de Corea de acabar con imperialismo yanqui, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Es inmutable conviccion de Corea de acabar con imperialismo yanqui, destaca Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- Los imperialistas yanquis hablan sin titubeo de que durante los ejercicios conjuntos militares "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle 16" a desarrollarse en seguida revisaran la realidad de la "operacion combinada de descabezamiento", articulo principal de la "OPLAN 5015" y de la "operacion de eliminacion" de las armas nucleares y de cohetes estrategicos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Esto es la mas grave provocacion politica y la extremidad de los actos hostiles contra la RPDC.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este jueves y prosigue:
					
					La declaracion crucial recien publicada de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea es el manifiesto de la posicion rotunda y la vehemente voluntad de venganza de castigar despiadadamente hasta el fin en cualquier lugar de la Tierra a quienes intenten atreverse a atentar al Sol y derribar el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos debe pagar sin falta el mas tragico y horrible precio por sus actos criminales.
					
					Pasa igual en cuanto a EE.UU. Si este imperio sigue recurriendo a la absurda locura militar sin tener juicio ante la advertencia de la RPDC, tanto el territorio principal de EE.UU. como las bases de agresion de la region de Asia-Pacifico se convertiran en cenizas por el golpe al estilo coreano consolidado de siglo en siglo para la batalla final y por la sagrada guerra de venganza inimaginable.
					
					Es una gran equivocacion si uno piensa en que el territorio principal norteamericano sea seguro por situarse allende el oceano.
					
					Es inmutable la conviccion de todos los militares y civiles de acabar con el imperialismo yanqui levantandose unanimemente en la confrontacion con los yanquis.
					
					EE.UU. se encuentra en la bifurcacion del destino: recibir el castigo implacable de la RPDC o pedir disculpas aunque sea tarde y salvar la situacion.
					
					EE.UU. debe hacer la opcion final.
